title: Onekoo Coffee eCommerce Platform
description: A modern direct-to-consumer platform enabling global customers to purchase premium Ethiopian coffee directly from local producers.
role: Lead Full Stack Engineer & System Architect
content: The platform was built to streamline cross-border coffee sales while improving transparency between farmers, roasters, and consumers. The solution integrates storytelling through product origins and detailed traceability.
development: Designed using a headless architecture with separate storefront and admin panels. Integrated secure checkout, inventory tracking, multi-currency pricing, and international shipping APIs.
ui_ux_strategy: Focused on brand-driven visual storytelling, emphasizing origin, flavor profiles, and sustainable farming. Implemented intuitive product navigation and a single-page cart to reduce friction.

title: OCFCU Official Website
description: A corporate and informational platform representing Africa’s largest coffee union, showcasing cooperatives, exports, and sustainability programs.
content: The project aimed to digitize OCFCU's organizational presence and provide data access for buyers, stakeholders, and global partners.
development: Implemented a modular CMS with dynamic content for cooperatives, news, reports, and export data. Added multi-language support and SEO-optimized static pages.
ui_ux_strategy: Utilized a clean, institutional design highlighting credibility, certification badges, and cooperative impact. Enhanced accessibility and readability for international audiences.

title: Constantine African Foundation Web Platform
description: A full-featured NGO platform centralizing media, charitable projects, educational content, and donation-driven eCommerce.
content: The foundation required a unified digital platform to promote events, publish articles, manage humanitarian projects, and process global donations and merchandise sales.
development: Developed a modular backend supporting blog posts, donation flows, project publishing, and product listings. Integrated payment gateways and role-based content management.
ui_ux_strategy: Designed a visually immersive platform inspired by African heritage and Orthodox design elements. Prioritized clear navigation and narrative-driven project pages for donor engagement.

title: Ghana Orthodox Church Website
description: A dynamic church portal providing liturgical resources, parish information, events, and community programs for Orthodox believers in Ghana.
content: The website was built to strengthen the digital presence of the Orthodox Church community in Ghana and provide access to timely communications and spiritual resources.
development: Implemented a custom CMS for bishops’ messages, sermons, photo galleries, parishes, clergy directories, and announcements. Deployed multi-language support and caching for global visitors.
ui_ux_strategy: Focused on simplicity, accessibility, and reverent visual identity inspired by Orthodox iconography. Ensured mobile responsiveness and lightweight navigation.

title: Orthodox Praying Cross-Platform Mobile App
description: A devotional mobile app offering prayers, saints’ lives, liturgical readings, and spiritual tools for Orthodox faithful worldwide.
content: The app provides structured spiritual resources, curated prayers, and a daily liturgical guide to support believers in their spiritual journey.
development: Built using a cross-platform architecture supporting offline content, dynamic updates, audio prayers, and push notifications. Designed modular prayer categories with multi-language support.
ui_ux_strategy: Designed a sacred and calm UI inspired by Orthodox art, emphasizing readability, night mode for prayers, and quick access navigation.

title: Hayes Addis Hotel Hospitality Website
description: A visually appealing website for Hayes Addis Hotel, showcasing rooms, amenities, booking options, and local attractions to enhance guest experience.
role: Web Developer & UX Designer, SEO Specialist and OTA Integration
content: The website showcases rooms, amenities, booking options, and local attractions to enhance guest experience.
development: Implemented an easy-to-navigate booking system integrated with popular OTAs, dynamic room displays, and a blog for local attractions. Focused on SEO optimization for increased visibility.
ui_ux_strategy: Designed a user-friendly interface with high-quality visuals, intuitive navigation, and clear calls to action to drive bookings.
